mapper.sql: RUN_PARAM, P1, P2, P3, P4, P5, OPERATOR, RUN_DATETIME, OUTBOND_PATH, RESULT, MESSAGE, REPORT_ID
mapper.select: select d.BIANMA PARAGRAPH, d.`NAME` PARAGRAPH_NAME, d.NAME_EN PARAGRAPH_PATH from sys_dictionaries d where d.PARENT_ID in (select sd.DICTIONARIES_ID from sys_dictionaries sd where sd.BIANMA = #{paragraphCode}) order by d.ORDER_BY asc

SELECT sd.BIANMA PARAGRAPH_TYPE, d.BIANMA PARAGRAPH_CODE, d.`NAME` PARAGRAPH_NAME, d.NAME_EN PARAGRAPH_PATH FROM sys_dictionaries d, sys_dictionaries sd WHERE d.PARENT_ID = sd.DICTIONARIES_ID AND sd.BIANMA IN ('RP01','RP02','RP03','RP04','RP05') ORDER BY sd.BIANMA,d.ORDER_BY ASC

SELECT sm.FULL_NAME AS mgrFullName, sfs.SIGNOFF_1 as signOff1, sfs.SIGNOFF_2 as signOff2 FROM sys_fund_info sfi LEFT JOIN sys_mgrcompany sm ON sm.COMPANY_CODE = sfi.FIRM_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_fund_signoff sfs ON sfs.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sm.ACTIVE = sfi.ACTIVE AND sfs.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfs.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT wb.BTCODE as bsCode, IF(wb.BEGIN_BALANCE_EY = 0, null, wb.BEGIN_BALANCE_EY) as beginBalance, IF(wb.END_BALANCE_EY = 0, null, wb.END_BALANCE_EY) as endBalance FROM wp_bs wb WHERE 1 = 1 AND wb.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND wb.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT WP.BSCODE AS plCode, IF( WP.AMOUNT_CURRENT_EY = 0, NULL, WP.AMOUNT_CURRENT_EY ) AS periodAcct, IF( WP.AMOUNT_LAST_EY = 0, NULL, WP.AMOUNT_LAST_EY ) AS lastPeriodAcct FROM wp_pl WP WHERE 1 = 1 AND WP.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND WP.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_ALL, 'N') AS stockAll, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_BS, 'N') AS stockBs, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_R, 'N') AS stockR, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_P, 'N') AS stockP, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_ALL, 'N') AS bondAll, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_BS, 'N') AS bondBs, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_R, 'N') AS bondR, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_P, 'N') AS bondP, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_ALL, 'N') AS goldAll, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_BS, 'N') AS goldBs, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_R, 'N') AS goldR, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_P, 'N') AS goldP, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_S_INT, 'N') AS riskSInt, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_S_PRICE, 'N') AS riskSPrice, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_E_PRICE, 'N') AS riskEPrice FROM sys_fund_control sfc WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfc.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfc.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS FS_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR2, 'N' ) AS FS_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR3, 'N' ) AS FS_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.COMISSION_NOTE, 'N' ) AS COMISSION_NOTE, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS MF_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR2, 'N' ) AS MF_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR3, 'N' ) AS MF_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR4, 'N' ) AS MF_ATTR4, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR5, 'N' ) AS MF_ATTR5, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS CF_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR2, 'N' ) AS CF_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR3, 'N' ) AS CF_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR4, 'N' ) AS CF_ATTR4, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR5, 'N' ) AS CF_ATTR5, IFNULL( src.IR_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS IR_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.IR_UP, 'N' ) AS IR_UP, IFNULL( src.IR_DOWN, 'N' ) AS IR_DOWN, IFNULL( src.PR_UP, 'N' ) AS PR_UP, IFNULL( src.PR_DOWN, 'N' ) AS PR_DOWN, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS PR_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR2, 'N' ) AS PR_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR3, 'N' ) AS PR_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.FV_ATTR1, 'N' ) AS FV_ATTR1 FROM sys_report_content src WHERE 1 = 1 AND src.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND src.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1
